body:
In this forum game, you are going to write down your bucket list..
But it doesn't mean that you should write down the whole list, but pick one of the
thing that you really want to do before you die. xD
So here is my favorite:
= Be an actor in a famous movie =D


Now, tell me your favorite ones! :P

Hey! Thats cheeting! You cant name something you already are!1!1!1!1 (Number 1 <3)

@OP 

1-Get a job

2-Have a friend (Dazzzz hard 4 meh)

3-Have a wife that I love, and kids that are healthy, and thats basically it, Ill love them no matter what tey, just god forbid they dont have a physical or mental disease...
